column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We decided that we were going to split everything since we wanted to order way to much... So we got the king crab tower
column2: prime aged bone in rib eye
column3: and the corn elote.  Crab tower was one of the best I have had anywhere
column4: succulent huge pieces of crab and great fresh oysters.  Next we split the steak which was the perfect amount for both of us.  Absolutely delicious
column5: definitely a top 5 steak for me so far.  The corn
column6: even though it seems strangely out of place on the menu
column8: buttery and flavorful.  Definitely a new favorite!
